Class AdminBlocker

extends java.lang.Object
    A class is used to create and execute lock (unlock) database queries.

      • blockUser

        public boolean blockUser(java.sql.Connection connection,
                         java.lang.String userLogin)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates and executes a user lock query to a database.
        Parameters:
        connection - - a connection to a database.
        userLogin - - a login of a user which will be blocked.
        Returns:
        true.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - - if a database access error or other errors occurred.
